job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongMidlevel Software Engineer at Def MethodstrongppNew York NYppstronguAbout Def MethodustrongppAt Def Method we believe in the integrity of our engineering the utility of our products and the solutions we provide for our customers As consultants we apply XP agile and usercentered design principles to help our customers large and small bring their products to lifeppstrongValue prop of this rolestrongppAt Def Method you get to work on a variety of projects solve coding challenges and work with a team of languageagnostic experts wholl have your back Youll promote diversity inclusion and understanding within your team We know youre not just hands on a keyboard You have ideas and well want to hear themppstronguWhat Youll BringustrongpulliProactive and enthusiastic commitment to customer best interests and ongoing process improvementliliGeneralist flexibility to adapt to customer environments and bring consultative expertiseliliEffective communication with the Def Method team and with customers and willingness to give and receive growthoriented feedbacklili3 years experience working with JavaScript Ruby Python Java or CliliDesire to learn and work with a range of technologies for example Go Swift Kotlin and ClojureliliKnowledge of and experience with agile software development principles and associated practices including testdriven development pair programming design patterns and refactoringliliStrengths in web development or native mobile development with a desire to expand personal rangeliulpstronguHow Youll Spend Your TimeustrongpulliMaking software in small teams with active customer involvementliliCollaborating with engineers product managers designers and stakeholdersliliHelping team members and the company as a whole improve through your inputliliLearning from and with colleagues as we seek to make the best software we canliulpstrongWhy we love working herestrongpulliGreat pay and benefits  comprehensive health dental vision 401k matching paid parental leave even life insuranceliliGenerous vacation and 1 month of paid time off for professional developmentliliVery minimal travel if everliliWere communitycentric and find ways to give backliliRemote first work cultureliulpWe promote diversity inclusion and understanding within our team We constantly strive to build a company as diverse as the city we live in and the customers we supportppemThis position may be performed remotely if approved by the Company from anywhere except the State of Coloradoemp
